locations.title: Galeguard Set
locations.description:
Craftable upon defeating the [Stone Vanguard](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=397637)	

**Set Pieces:**
- Galeguard Beast Mask (headgear)
- Galeguard Beastmaw Armor (body)
- Galeguard Bracers (arms)
- Galeguard Greaves (legs)

**Rarity:** Rare 

**Defence:** 18 / 35 / 14 / 21 
   
**Effect:** 
- 4% Shock Resistance (body)	
- Performing 3 consecutive perfect dodges within a brief moment recovers a moderate amount of Mana (legs)	

**Set Bonus:**
- Gale Guardian: Upon perfect dodges, grants considerable additional focus (2 pieces equipped)
- Perfect dodges slightly reduces cooldown for all spells (4 pieces equipped)

locations.title: Loongwreathe Staff
locations.description:
**Location:** Craftable after defeating [Black Loong](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=397647) or [Red Loong](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=398284) (in Chapter 1)  

**Damage:** 70  
**Critical Chance:** 0  

**Unique Effect:** Moderately increases the damage dealt by all Pillar Stance moves	

**Crafting Ingredients:** 
- 1 Thunder Tail
- 1 Thunderbone
- 4 Refined Iron Sand
- 21,000 Will

locations.title: Rat Sage Staff
locations.description:
**Location:** Craftable upon defeating the [Yellow Wind Sage](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=397641)   

**Damage:** 66  
**Critical Chance:** 7% Critical Hit Chance  

**Unique Effect:** The fourth move of light attack combo and mobile staff spin can stir up a whirlwind of sands, increases attack range and damage

**Crafting Ingredients:** 
- 1 Samadhi Wind Agate
- 4 Refined Iron Sand
- 8 Yaoguai Core
- 21,000 Will

locations.title: Xu Dog
locations.description:
**Location:** Inside the cave. 

Defeat [Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=397429) and then return to him with the [Evil Repelling Medicant](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=398788) formula.  He will teach you how to brew them at Shrines

**Related Quest:** [Xu Dog's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=398921)
